name: MAZEMAZE
description:
"MAZEMAZE" is an adventure game where you explore maps, find objects, and progress through the game.

◆ Story

One day, the protagonist, after jumping off a building, realizes they are in a mysterious space.

Upon advancing for a while, they are prompted by a guide to proceed through corridors. It turns out to be a maze with various elements.

◆ Game Features

Progress through the story by finding objects.

Intuitive and not overly challenging puzzles.

No quest markers or time limits, allowing for a relaxed gameplay experience.

★The ending will vary depending on the number of dogs found.
